languages.text: "Верно. Единственное решение — сражаться до последней капли крови и добыть победу во славу Императора либо умереть, пытаясь".

traits.locale_text: "Верно. Единственное решение — сражаться до последней капли крови и добыть победу во славу Императора либо умереть, пытаясь".

languages.text: "Indeed. Our only option is to fight to the last drop of blood and secure victory for the glory of the Emperor, or to die in the attempt."
languages.original_text: "Верно. Единственное решение — сражаться до последней капли крови и добыть победу во славу Императора либо умереть, пытаясь".

traits.locale_text: "Indeed. Our only option is to fight to the last drop of blood and secure victory for the glory of the Emperor, or to die in the attempt."
"Indeed. Our only option is to fight to the last drop of blood and secure victory for the glory of the Emperor, or to die in the attempt."
"Indeed. Our only option is to fight to the last drop of blood and secure victory for the glory of the Emperor, or to die in the attempt."
"Indeed. Our only option is to fight to the last drop of blood and secure victory for the glory of the Emperor, or to die in the attempt."
"Indeed. Our only option is to fight to the last drop of blood and secure victory for the glory of the Emperor, or to die in the attempt."
"Indeed. Our only option is to fight to the last drop of blood and secure victory for the glory of the Emperor, or to die in the attempt."

languages.text: «En efecto. Nuestra única opción es luchar hasta la última gota de sangre y asegurar la victoria por la gloria del Emperador o morir en el intento».
languages.original_text: "Indeed. Our only option is to fight to the last drop of blood and secure victory for the glory of the Emperor, or to die in the attempt."

languages.text: 「いかにも。我らのたった一つの選択肢は、最後の血の一滴まで戦い、皇帝の栄光のために勝利を手に入れるか、そのために死ぬことである」
languages.original_text: "Indeed. Our only option is to fight to the last drop of blood and secure victory for the glory of the Emperor, or to die in the attempt."

languages.text: “确实如此，我们唯一的选择就是为了帝皇的荣耀赢得胜利，或是流尽最后一滴血，力战而死。”
languages.original_text: "Indeed. Our only option is to fight to the last drop of blood and secure victory for the glory of the Emperor, or to die in the attempt."

languages.text: "In der Tat. Unsere einzige Option ist, bis zum letzten Blutstropfen zu kämpfen, um für den Ruhm des Imperators zu siegen oder beim Versuch zu sterben."
languages.original_text: "Indeed. Our only option is to fight to the last drop of blood and secure victory for the glory of the Emperor, or to die in the attempt."

languages.text: « En effet. Notre seule option est de nous battre corps et âme et d'assurer la victoire pour la gloire de l'Empereur, ou de mourir en essayant. »
languages.original_text: "Indeed. Our only option is to fight to the last drop of blood and secure victory for the glory of the Emperor, or to die in the attempt."
"Indeed. Our only option is to fight to the last drop of blood and secure victory for the glory of the Emperor, or to die in the attempt."

languages.text: "Kesinlikle. Tek seçeneğimiz, kanımızın son damlasına dek savaşıp İmparator'un şanı için zafere erişmek ya da bu yolda can vermek."
languages.original_text: "Indeed. Our only option is to fight to the last drop of blood and secure victory for the glory of the Emperor, or to die in the attempt."
